content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's see, I was thinking around 2000 Euros per month. See if you can beat that price!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment sounds very attractive, especially with its central location and modern amenities. I'm sure it would be a great place to live. However, as a student, I'm on a tight budget. Is there any possibility we can negotiate the price down?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Sure, Yi-Nuo Wang, let's negotiate. Remember, it's a great apartment in a prime location. How about 1900 Euros per month? Try to convince me that you deserve a lower price!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer is very generous, and the location of the apartment is indeed ideal for my needs as a student. However, I'm looking to save as much as possible on rent to allocate my budget towards other living expenses and studies. Would you consider 1750 Euros per month? I believe this would be a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment while taking into account my financial situation as a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, 1750 Euros per month is quite a distance from what I'm looking for. I'm not interested in giving you a discount just because you're a student. However, I'm always up for a good negotiation. How about 1800 Euros per month? Try to convince me that's a fair price for you!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your flexibility is much appreciated. An offer of 1800 Euros per month is more aligned with what I'm seeking. As a student, I'm usually smart and not easily tricked, so I believe this price reflects the value of the apartment while considering my financial constraints. I agree to the price of 1800 Euros per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1800] Euro! Congratulations, Yi-Nuo Wang! We have a deal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
